titles.title: Service Workers Protection Act
A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act with respect to the right to organize of certain security personnel.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.
Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Labor Department.

bill.summary: 3/25/1988--Introduced. Service Workers Protection Act - Amends the National Labor Relations Act to provide that a specified prohibition against certification of labor organizations representing both "guards" and other employees, for collective bargaining unit purposes, is to be applied only in the case of "plant security guards" whose primary responsibility is to prevent employee disorder and misconduct.
